general_info.summary: The provided text appears to be a list or directory of various services, initiatives, and informational categories, predominantly associated with an institution named "Sharda." It covers a wide range of topics including banking and postal services, leadership, history, statutory bodies, tenders, legal frameworks (Acts, Statutes, Ordinances), COVID-19 information, counselling services (Family & Couple, Career), capacity building, language and soft skill development, technology awareness, entrepreneurship and innovation, an FM radio station ("Suno Sharda"), observership programs, a mentoring portal ("Paramarsh"), and updates related to Sharda University's international campuses (Uzbekistan, Agra), human values courses, and international credit transfer programs.
